startCard.startCardDescription: High income. Flexible timing. Make new friends.

faqPage.question2General: What can we use it for?
faqPage.question3General: How to join as a Babe?
faqPage.question4General: How do i get paid when i join as a babe?
faqPage.question5General: How do we review and verify RentBabe profiles?
faqPage.question6General: What is the commission on Credit withdraws?
faqPage.question1Rules: What is the important rules and guidelines?
faqPage.question2Credit: Can I get paid immediately after I completed my service?
faqPage.answer1General: RentBabe a platform that allow users to rent a date, rent a friend, rent a gamer or any other social purposes.
faqPage.answer2General: You can rent a member to hang out with, go to a cafe or restaurant with, or someone to go with you to a party or event. Rent someone to teach you a new skill or hobby, or to show you around an unfamiliar town. Our members also offer E-Meets, relationship advice and other online services. You can also hire a professional gamer here!
faqPage.answer3General: It is FREE to join as a Babe. Click on black button 'Be a Babe' and submit your application. Application review takes within 48 hours. Please read our guideline to speed up application process.
faqPage.answer4General: PayNow and WISE for now. Other payment methods works too, but it might take a long time.
faqPage.answer5General: We use Instagram verification, Government issued ID for profile verification and also allow users to give reviews/feedbacks for every meetup they went. We do not collect, use, or disclose an individual's document. Please censor all sensitive information except for date of birth and face photo.
faqPage.answer6General: It is a 25% platform fee and 0.29 SGD fee for Credit withdrawal. The commission on withdraw keeps the platform operates and allow us to market for more clients. Thank you for your support!
faqPage.answer1Rent: Send an order request. Once order is accepted, you may proceed to make payment to unlock the chat. Subscribe to get 10% more credit for every purchase with no transaction fees!
faqPage.answer2Rent: Our platform prevents unnecessary chatting, it does not allow you to message the user directly. Most users here does not like to beat around the bush. When you send a request order, a form will pop out that asks you for important details such as venue, time, date of the service. Chats are unlocked after user make the payment.
faqPage.answer1Rules: This is strictly platonic (No touching at all) platform. We do not allow adult contents, prostitution or any form of fraudulent activities on our platform. All meetups MUST be at a public dine-in place with crowd. Please respect our members. If you violate the rules, you will be banned from using our platform. Customer(s) with/without Premium subscription who violate our rules will also be banned from using our platform.  We will NOT refund your credits
faqPage.answer2Rules: We DO NOT support off-platform transaction. Any user who exchanges contacts before a payment is made, will result in account suspension. Our on-platform transaction by using Credits protects your personal information and prevent you from getting scam. We ban users who are trying to do off-platform transaction. When a client pay through our platform, they have agreed on the terms of servcies stated on our website.
faqPage.answer1Refund: Common refund reasons include harassment, non-consensual recording, negative attitude, and suspicious transactions. If you ever feel uncomfortable during an order, you should leave and initiate a refund and report the incident to customer service by emailing hello@RentBabe.com. Note our refund window is 3 days after completion. Completed orders won’t be able to be refunded if they are more than three days old.
faqPage.answer2Refund: A 100% Credit refund is given if you cancelled the meetup within 72 hours from the original date of payment. A 100% Credit refund is applicable if your date did not turn up or when your date cancelled the meetup. If the cancellation is made less than 6 hours to the scheduled meet-up time, only 50% Credit of the payment made will be refunded. In an event, where the Member is late, for instance, 15 mins, he/she will stay 15 mins more to compensate for the time gone. You will also have a choice of getting a full refund if he/she is late by more than 30 mins if You do not wish to continue with the date. In the event if Your date did not turn up, You will get a 100% Credit refund and your date will receive a penalty from us.
faqPage.answer1Credit: 'Penalty Credits' refers to the amount of credits that will be deducted from your 'Income Credit'. For example, if you have 10 Income Credit and 1 Penalty Credit. You will only be able to withdraw 9 Credits to Cash. We give penalty for users who misconduct.
faqPage.answer2Credit: Yes! Your client is able to transfer the Pending Credit to your Income Credit immediately after they have have confirm that the service is completed.
faqPage.answer3Credit:
“Credit” is a virtual currency used on RentBabe, it can be used to pay for services and tips. 1.00 Credit = 1.00 SGD

“Credit balance” is the remaining deposit on your account that could be spent. The money in “Credit balance” is a non-withdrawable currency that can only be spent on the platform.
faqPage.answer4Credit:
Pending Credit refers to your Credit income that is within the Security Period (3-7 days). They will be transferred to your account after this period.

If you’ve completed less than 3 orders, your Security Period would be 7 days.

If you’ve completed 3-9 orders, your Security Period would be 5 days.

If you’ve completed over 10 orders, your Security Period would be 3 days.
faqPage.answer5Credit: “Credit income” refers to the income you have generated through providing services and collecting tips. Income can be withdrawn.

modal.requestMessage: We only issue refund within 72 hours from the date of purchase

profile.verificationTooltipText: This user has submitted a clear selfie photo of them holding their government issued ID to prove their identity o's new to h and they are not underage.

gameRules.description: RentBabe is dedicated to creating a platform for users to rent a date, rent a friend purely for social purposes only. To reach this goal, please observe our Multimedia Policy when uploading images to your profile. You can read the full policy here RentBabe Attire Policy. These policies apply to all genders.
gameRules.gameRule1: 1. Screenshots must display information of an account of which you are the sole owner
gameRules.gameRule2: 2. You must display some form of game-skill. Level, Rank, Match History, an In game Scoreboard, Battle Pass level, etc. If you have a rank listed, your screenshot must display your rank.
gameRules.gameRule3: 3. Images/videos and all texts must comply with the RentBabe guidelines and policies. They must also be relevant to RentBabe, ads on RentBabe, or game-related user contributions.
gameRules.gameRule4: 4. If ranking, leaderboards are irrelevant for this game, you could also showcase your skills by uploading your epic gaming moments.
gameRules.cardDescription1: A screenshot that clearly shows your game skills
gameRules.cardDescription2: No skill display - i.e. no level, rank, etc.

voiceRules.description: RentBabe is dedicated to creating a platform for users to rent a date, rent a friend purely for social purposes only. To reach this goal, please observe our Multimedia Policy when uploading images to your profile. You can read the full policy here RentBabe Attire Policy. These policies apply to all genders.
voiceRules.criteria1: 1. The quality of the audio track, and its background noise.
voiceRules.criteria3: 3. Whether you have talked about the services you are providing and/or your in-game skills and/or preferences.
voiceRules.hint1: 1. Record your line in a quiet environment with a decent quality microphone, and try to keep your volume consistent.
voiceRules.hint2: 2. Don’t speak too fast nor too slow, make yourself easy to understand.
voiceRules.hint4: 4. Humour is a great selling point, so tell some jokes if you have any.

imageRules.description: RentBabe is dedicated to creating a platform for users to rent a date, rent a friend purely for social purposes only. To reach this goal, please observe our Multimedia Policy when uploading images to your profile. You can read the full policy here RentBabe Attire Policy. These policies apply to all genders.
imageRules.criteria1: 1. The general quality of the image, and its resolution
imageRules.criteria2: 2. What is in the background, messy or clean
imageRules.criteria4: 4. whether if all facial features are clearly defined
imageRules.criteria5: 5. At least one full body photo of you to show your body type, if you are tall, slim, short.
imageRules.footerDescription: Stay true and authentic! Dont worry, looks are perspective. Coming out with these guidelines show that we are transparent with our services.
imageRules.cardDescription1: Clean background, well-defined facial feature and show body type. This is a great portrait.
imageRules.cardDescription2: Feels natural, but facial features are partially obstructed, and the background is a little messy.
imageRules.cardDescription3: Too much filter and obstruction on the face. Horrible filter and blurry effects.
imageRules.cardDescription4: Does not contain real person, look like a shady profile and does not proof your identity.
